version_description:
Cool Easter update!  Many theatrical content: 
        - Egg Launcher; 
        - 2 holiday grenades; 
     &nb

A lot of cool new content in this update! We have added personal tanks! Now you can buy your own tank and destroy the enemies!

Awesome personal tanks:
- Leopard
- Abrams
- Warrior

Brand New guns:
- Golden Axe
- Toxic Flame

Super ZOMBIE update!
The city is increased almost two times! Enjoy new and huge Zomby District which is naturally full of zombies.
Finally with the zombies the night has come to the city! The stars, the dark skies and the chill! We hope you'll like
Bug fixes.

3 cool cars are added: Monster Truck, Wagen and Vaz.

Bug fixes.

Meet an update of a lifetime! Update 4.0!
1. Animation of the main characters and their enemies has been elaborated. 
2. The second type of camera has been added. Now you are given an opportunity of switching from an old camera to a new one.

1. Quality adjustment has been added. Now everyone can customize graphics quality for his/her device!
2. 3 new guns have been added
- FAMAS
- P90
- Railgun
3. 7 guns have been updated!
4 Stairs mechanics has been improved.
5. Helicopt

- 2 new guns: Vector (Up1, Up2), Unica (Up1)
- Brand new PVP Map - Roofs.
- Game optimization
- Bug fixes.

1. Scoring and reputation systems. Score more points online and become more popular in the city!
2. A new method of earning gold – there are hidden coins around the city. We’ve hidden 25 coins all over Block city. Do you think you will manage to find a
Bug fixes.

Here comes a terrific New Year Update comprising the biggest number of features ever! 

It’s real winter in Block City: 
- it snows; 
- mobs have new skins; 
- new mob types – Crazy Santas and Christmas Rabbit;

1. The long-expected First-Person Camera is finally here! Turn on the FPS cam from the pause menu and try out the brand new game experience! 
2. New unique content: 
- Deadly Bow with unique shooting mechanics 
- Powerful Bow
Bug fixes.

Welcome a new overarching update in Block City Wars! What’s new: 
1. New optimized Block City. Game performance has been greatly improved. 
2. A new intellectual camera. 
3. Navigation around the city has been improved. 
4.

What’s new: 
1. Tutorial bug fixed.
2. New optimized Block City. Game performance has been greatly improved. 
3. A new intellectual camera. 
4. Navigation around the city has been improved. 
5. A new game interface with

What’s new: 
1. Improved battles: enhanced camera movement and player control 
2. Fixed animation in the first person mod 
3. Improved grenade functions 
4. A new sight with indicators that show whether you hit the target o
Several bugs fixed.

1. A new game mode – Battle for Respect. Fight with other players to occupy Block City districts! The occupied districts will bring you profit!  
2. Vehicle control has been improved, effects have been added.  
3. The city planning has bee

1. We have completely updated the reputation system! Now you can get reputation in any game mode!
2. We have updated the interfaces:
- completely new end-of-battle screen;
- improved the game leaders display;
- changed the main menu screen.

1. Bug fixes and improvements
2. New game animations and notifications
3. Upgraded mission system

The most powerful game changes within the last 2 years! 

Sandbox mode has been radically changed! Reputation is citywide now, so the higher your reputation is, the more prizes you get 

The new system of Leagues and Cups! The more f

1. Zombie Island is back in our game!
2. Chests with variety free prizes
3. New game modes are added:
- Team Battle. Capture the base or dominate in the whole city.
- Tank Clash. Team tank battles with occupation of the military base.
- Str

1. The long awaited system of friends! Find new friends, chat and play with them.
2. Spring comes in Block City.
3. Brand new cars: muscle car Hemi and monster truck and School Monster!
4. Cars and tanks control was improved.
5. The new map f

Are you ready for another update? This update offers you 3 new modes!
1. RocketBall. Yep, you can play football in a special arena while sitting in your ride!
2. SkyBlock. Make it to the Champions Cup and win it!
3. Cops vs. Robbers. Make the

1. Turbo Ball mode is improved!
- synchronization of cars and ball is corrected
- new animation of goals celebrating
- new item - Nitro.
2. The tutorial is simplified! Now new players adapt to our game faster!
3. New screen of game mode set

期待已久的7.1.6更新终于来了！！！
加入人类对外星人侵略的抵抗并试试一系列新功能。

新城市
- 欢迎来到新的两倍大的像素城市！
- 收集所有35个秘密钱币以获得额外的金币。探索时间到！
- 参观汽车旅馆、监狱、加油站，甚至是巨型外星人母舰
- 新地点拥有更多小怪和托尼任务

战斗通行证
- 完成有趣的任务并获得许多独特的奖励。收集外星人兵工厂、激光自行车和飞行外星人坦克！

新模式
- 大逃杀。在最流行的体裁中试试你的技能

Long-expected update of Block City Wars is now available! New features: 
1. Three new modes - Titan Robots, Robot Battle and Monster Hunter! 
2. Brand new feature customization of vehicles! Improve the parameters of your favorite car
